<form class="form" name="contact" method="POST"  netlify-honeypot="bot-field" data-netlify="true">

  <p type="Name:"><input placeholder="Write your name here.."></input></p>
  <p type="Email:"><input placeholder="Let us know how to contact you back.." ></input></p>
  <p type="Message:"><input placeholder="What would you like to tell us.." required="required" ></input></p>
  <button>Send Message</button>
  <div2>
    <span2 class="fa fa-phone"></span2>0049 17661109008</p>
    <span2 class="fa fa-envelope-o"></span2> contact@saldaeanalytics.com </p>
  </div2>
</form>
